title: Cyber Apocalypse CTF 2025
description:
Team H-T8 participated in Cyber Apocalypse CTF 2025: Tales from Eldoria and secured 345th position out of 8100+ teams. The team solved 51 out of 77 flags in total and did 35 challenges out of 62.

Strongest categories where the team solved all of the challenges were: AI, Coding, OSINT.
